entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:13 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
